content.rendered:
Put Your Business at the Top With Custom-Made

PHP Development Solutions

Unified Infotech is an internationally-renowned PHP development company, aimed at assisting organizations in achieving their business endeavors. Our expert PHP developers are responsible for developing complex back-end components, integrating third-party web services, and supporting front-end developers.

Our test-driven PHP development includes but is not limited to Application Development, Product Engineering, PWA & SPA Solutions, Technology Migration, and Maintenance.

Get Started

Technical Expertise of Our PHP Developers

Our PHP developers are equipped with and well-versed in all the latest technologies and have partnered with our clients to deliver high-end applications.

Framework
Frontend
Database
Collaboration Tools
DevOps
Hosting
Share Project Requirement

Our Portfolio Speaks…

Boards & Beyond

Application Modernization for an eLearning Platform acquired by McGraw Hill Education

We partnered with the client to transform their dated legacy system into a modern-day eLearning solution with advanced capabilities and a seamless user experience. The solution recorded 2x sales and 3x user engagement in just 1 month post launch and continues to grow rapidly.

Contact Us View Details

Media

Enterprise Web Application Development for a Fortune 50 Media Conglomerate

We engineered a robust web application for the client’s marketing team that enabled them to better manage and monitor their blue-chip advertising customers.

Contact Us View Details

Openreel

Product Engineering For a Venture-Funded SaaS Product Company with Patented Technology

From an idea on a document, to now this Seed Funded SaaS business, we are the proud end-to-end technology partner and continue to scale the product.

Contact Us View Details

Pharmaceutical

Enterprise Software Development & Scaling For a Global Pharmaceutical Leader

Unified Infotech designed and engineered a highly sophisticated and secured Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) application that seamlessly enables end-users to develop new drug formulations supported by an intelligent recommendation and validation engine.

Contact Us View Details

Hire Vetted PHP Developers as Per Your Requirements

We use best-in-class tools, state-of-the-art technologies, and modern approaches to scale up your business.

Hire Us Now

$25/hr

$3200/month

* 160 hrs per month

*** All our contracts are secured by US Legal Agreements and Professional NDAs with complete insurance protection.

Frequently Asked Questions

Who is Unified Infotech?

Unified Infotech Inc is a 12+ yrs software development agency with offices in New York & India. We have over 150+ technology experts and have delivered over 1200 solutions across the globe. We were also recognized by Deloitte as one of the fastest 50-growing tech companies.

How are Unified Infotech’s PHP Developers better?

Our PHP developers are subjected to a thorough screening process before we onboard them. Thus, we select the cream of the crop. Furthermore, the developers undergo regular training and are evaluated quarterly to make sure they are up to the global standards and latest technologies. We also have an internal code audit team that continuously audits codes thereby enabling us to remain ahead of the curve.

How experienced are your PHP Developers?

On average, our PHP developers have 8-9 years of experience.

Do you share the developer’s profile or CV during selection?

To make sure that we cater to your requirements, we share the developer’s CV. Before you make the final call, you can schedule an interview with the developers.

What if I am not satisfied with the work of your developer?

If you are not content with the PHP developers, then you have the full liberty to request a change. We make the required change within 24 business hours.

Do you sign NDAs?

We are a registered US Incorporation and have complete legal US agreements and NDAs in place along with insurance protection.

Get in Touch

Not Just PHP – You can Build a Complete Team with Unified Infotech

Discovery Worshop

This brings alignment in terms of end-user persona and business needs

Planning

Emphasize on planning to get everything documented without assumption

Design

Next step is to design the UI based on the approved wireframes

Development

Crafting an optimized clean code structure is our objective at this stage

Testing

Once bug fixing is done, the final sprint demo is sent for the client’s approval

Maintainance

We also upgrade the system regularly based on new software/version release

Project Managers

Our project manager micromanages everything from planning and developing project ideas, tracking progress to the evaluation of project performance.

Tools and Technologies Used:

Team Gnatt, Jira, Confluence, MS Project, MS Teams

Business Analyst

Our expert business analysts form detailed insights and suggest business changes through meticulous analysis and documentation.

Tools and Technologies Used:

Jira, Confluence, Epic Mapping, Use Case Documentation

UI Designers

Our experienced UI designers work in tandem with web designers to create modern and interactive interfaces to ensure enhanced user experience and conversion rates.

Tools and Technologies Used:

Zeplin, Axure RP, Sketch, Figma, Adobe, Invision, Shutterstock, Flaticon

Frontend Developers

Our front-end developers are responsible for creating compelling visual elements on a page and building the website’s client side. They ensure that the viewers have the best experience and interaction.

Tools and Technologies Used:

ReactJS, AngularJS, VueJS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React Native

DevOps

Our DevOps engineers play a pivotal role in ensuring the seamless operation of the IT architecture. They rely on CI/CD practices to combine codes and maintain and manage applications.

Tools and Technologies Used:

AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Cloudflare, Digital Ocean

Testing and QA Teams

To ensure optimum software solution performance and functionality, our sedulous QA engineers and testing teams employ various testing methodologies from manual to intricate automated testing.

Tools and Technologies Used:

Codacy, BrowserStack, TestRail

Share Project Requirement
